content:
Hey, UCSF (at ONC's request) is launching a website to catalogue interoperability experiences at https://interopselect.ucsf.edu/. My understanding is that it's generally aimed at reviewing current experiences purchasing and implementing EHR vendor interfaces for edge system interoperability

Might be interesting for clinicians or healthcare organization users here to give their input. I don't see options for FHIR as it stands, though.

When I click the question mark after Data Connection, I got this "Nunc vestibulum euismod at sed varius adipiscing vestibulum nam malesuada mi feugiat in consectetur ridiculus nibh ligula magna in a fermentum arcu. Himenaeos libero vestibulum eros nunc condimentum a justo dignissim a ultrices adipiscing ut ullamcorper dignissim dis ad a elementum condimentum arcu phasellus fames parturient a scelerisque faucibus velit."
Oh good point. That seems like great feedback to give to the UCSF
